thread.title: Aaron Hernandez lawyers ask for search warrant to be tossed
thread.title_full: Aaron Hernandez lawyers ask for search warrant to be tossed

title: Aaron Hernandez lawyers ask for search warrant to be tossed
text: > Top News Aaron Hernandez lawyers ask for search warrant to be tossed Former New England Patriots NFL football player Aaron Hernandez sits in the court room during his hearing at Suffolk Superior Court in Boston, Wednesday, Oct. 6, 2015. Lawyers for Hernandez have asked a judge to throw out a search warrant that led police to seize a vehicle that prosecutors say Hernandez was driving when he fatally shot two Boston men in 2012. (Matt Stone/The Boston Herald via AP, Pool)
